name: ai-api-tester
description: Global CLI tool that intelligently generates comprehensive test suites for existing Node.js projects using AI. This is a **global npm package** that you can install once and use across **all your Node.js projects**. Simply run `ai-api-tester` in any project directory and it will **scan your routes and controllers**, analyze your code structure, and generate **intelligent, comprehensive tests** using AI. Perfect for adding test coverage to **existing projects** without writing tests manually, where AI understands your codebase context and generates production-ready test suites.
